name: Luke Bonaccorsi
bio: Luke Bonaccorsi (he/him/his) is a developer who started building web things in the early 2000s as a hobbyist before making a career of it in 2011. He’s currently a Product Developer at AND Digital, and is the organiser of LeedsJS. In his free time, he’s an amateur chef, expert eater, casual pixel artist and a chaotic maker.
